Data is retrieved using package from [here](https://jaseziv.github.io/worldfootballR/articles/extract-fbref-data.html)
Underlying data is from FBref and transfrmarket

## Basic Setup
```{r installing packages}
# install.packages("worldfootballR")
library(worldfootballR)
```
## Obtaining Player Databases
```{r}
# Database of all players
mapped_players = player_dictionary_mapping()

# stats for each player in 2022-23 EPL 
big5_player_shooting <- fb_big5_advanced_season_stats(season_end_year= 2023, stat_type= "shooting", team_or_player= "player")

# transfer valuations for all players in top 5 leagues over last 5 seasons
player_valuations <- tm_player_market_values(country_name = c("England", "Spain", "France", "Italy", "Germany"), start_year = c(2019:2023))
```
